name: Pokémon Expert Emerald
overview: This is a Difficulty MOD and a 386 Fusion created by Blue. It offers a wide range of new fun features expanding on the original Emerald game play. You are able to capture and register all 386 Pokémon available to the game through various different methods such as evolution, events and normal catching procedures. It has proven popular among many players as it has had over 50 pages of replies and approximately 33,000+ downloads over a span of two years.
